system.note: Make -10 Toughness Test or count as having failed a fear test, each DoF adds +10 to roll on shock table. Sealed suits immune to effect, Talents and traits that help against fear and poison help with test.

description.value:
Special: Blast (10)

Note: Make -10 Toughness Test or count as having failed a fear test, each DoF adds +10 to roll on shock table. Sealed suits immune to effect, Talents and traits that help against fear and poison help with test.
